DOC.brief_summary: We believe that knowing characteristics of uremic pruritus is the foundation to investigate its pathophysiology and offer better skin care for patients with chronic kidney disease. We therefore conducted this cross-sectional study to evaluate the characteristics of uraemic pruritus.
DOC.brief_title: Pruritus in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: Adults older than 20 years old, with CKD stage 3 to 5D, with symptoms of pruritus. Patients who refused to answer the questionnaire or unable to understand the contents of the questionnaire.
